title: Developing a new Lettering inspired by Kari font
content:
Hi Everyone!

I’m developing a logo to a grpahic design studio called ALBA.  
I’m trying to connect the letters B and A with a ligatture.

Sugestions?

This is my best try: [http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/4523/alba3d.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090703042021/http:/img32.imageshack.us/img32/4523/alba3d.png "http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/4523/alba3d.png")

Thanks!

author: caduprimola

comments.content:
Can’t figure out why there is a bump in the counter of the lc b — it’s totally unnecessary for a connecting script.

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO
